verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> I have <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and night before <S%H3915>you.<s%>
Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into your <S%H6440>presence.<s%> <S%H5186>Turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H7440>cry.<s%>
For my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H7451>troubles.<s%> My <S%H2416>life<s%> draws <S%H5060>near<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
I am <S%H2803>counted<s%> among those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%> I am like a <S%H1397>man<s%> who has no <S%H353>help,<s%>

<S%H2670>set<s%> apart among the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> like the <S%H2491>slain<s%> who <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave,<s%> whom you <S%H2142>remember<s%> no <S%H1504>more.<s%> They are cut off from your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
You have <S%H7896>laid<s%> me in the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>pit,<s%> in the <S%H4285>darkest<s%> <S%H4688>depths.<s%>
Your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> lies <S%H5564>heavily<s%> on <S%H6031>me.<s%> You have afflicted me with all your <S%H4867>waves.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

You have <S%H7368>taken<s%> my <S%H3045>friends<s%> <S%H7368>from<s%> <S%H7896>me.<s%> You have made me an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3607>them.<s%> I am confined, and I <S%H3318>can't<s%> escape.

My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H1669>dim<s%> from <S%H6040>grief.<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> on you <S%H3117>daily,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> I have spread <S%H7849>out<s%> my hands to <S%H3709>you.<s%>
Do you <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%> to the <S%H4191>dead?<s%> Do the <S%H7496>dead<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up and <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H5542>you?<s%> Selah.
Is your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H5608>declared<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave?<s%> Or your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> in <S%H11>Destruction?<s%>
Are your <S%H6382>wonders<s%> made <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark?<s%> Or your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5388>forgetfulness?<s%>
But to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, I have <S%H7768>cried.<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> comes before <S%H6923>you.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> why do you <S%H2186>reject<s%> my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> Why do you <S%H5641>hide<s%> your face from <S%H6440>me?<s%>
I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and ready to <S%H1478>die<s%> from my <S%H5290>youth<s%> <S%H5375>up.<s%> While I suffer your <S%H367>terrors,<s%> I am <S%H6323>distracted.<s%>
Your fierce <S%H2740>wrath<s%> has gone <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H1161>me.<s%> Your terrors have cut me <S%H6789>off.<s%>
They came <S%H5437>around<s%> me like <S%H4325>water<s%> all <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5362>long.<s%> They completely engulfed <S%H3162>me.<s%>
You have put <S%H157>lover<s%> and <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3045>me,<s%> and my friends into <S%H4285>darkness.<s%>
